name: Golden Ale
flavorDescription: Crisp and refreshing with a light malt sweetness and subtle hoppy bitterness.

name: Stouty Delight
flavorDescription: Rich, creamy body with notes of chocolate, coffee, and roasted malt.

name: Amber Lager
flavorDescription: Smooth caramel malt flavor with hints of toffee and a mild hop finish.

name: Hazy IPA
flavorDescription: Juicy and fruity with strong citrus, mango, and pineapple flavors and a soft mouthfeel.

name: Belgian Tripel
flavorDescription: Complex with fruity and spicy aromas, a dry finish, and a high alcohol warmth.

name: Crisp Pilsner
flavorDescription: Clean and crisp with a light malt sweetness and a refreshing bitterness from noble hops.
